div.div: Relationships between timing of breeding (1 st egg dates) and local spring warmth (warmth sum).
div.p: Larger values of the warmth sum reflect warmer springs and earlier laying. Least squares regression equations are: MW 1 st egg date = 63.9–0.0639 warmth sum, R 2 = 0.640, P < 0.001; BW 1 st egg date = 62.9–0.0639 warmth sum, R 2 = 0.681, P < 0.001; WW 1 st egg date = 71.0–0.0659 warmth sum, R 2 = 0.739, P < 0.001.
